actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore the deduction for interest paid on education loans.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an income tax deduction for interest on any indebtedness incurred to pay the educational expenses, including reasonable living expenses, of the taxpayer, spouse, or dependent.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore the deduction for interest paid on education loans.
